mapper.select: select * from AbpBusinessDetail with(nolock) where guid =#{guid}

select AbpBusinessDetail.Id, AbpBusinessDetail.Status, AbpBusinessDetail.guid, AbpBusinessDetail.PlateNumber, AbpBusinessDetail.CarInTime, AbpBerthsecs.BerthsecName, AbpBusinessDetail.Prepaid, AbpBusinessDetail.BerthNumber, AbpBusinessDetail.BerthsecId , ap.ParkType from AbpBusinessDetail with(nolock) right join TUser on CarNumber1 = PlateNumber or CarNumber2 = PlateNumber or CarNumber3 = PlateNumber left join AbpBerthsecs on AbpBerthsecs.Id = AbpBusinessDetail.BerthsecId LEFT JOIN AbpParks ap on ap.Id=AbpBusinessDetail.ParkId where TUser.uid = #{uid} and Status = 1 and AbpBusinessDetail.IsDeleted = 0 order by CarInTime desc
